overview: The film restores the usual atmosphere created by the fans during clasicos Barca vs Reak. The story takes place in popular district, where a powerful barbu(Boulahwajeb), leads a hunt for the barca fans. Sample of all the arenas of a wrestling, a real battle and a squabble that rarely stops ans knows its apogee at the approach of each classico.
title: Hala Madrid Visca Barca
